Text: Thanks for the upload! It will get me through till tomorrow! Been with 311 from the start, they have changed, but they are still my bros! Gotta love the live shows!

Some songs work perfectly, others not so much. Lots of jumping around and clipping in Rock on, its practically un-usable. Anybody else run into this issue? Could you possibly rip the songs again and re-upload? And in 320kps if possible? Thank you man!
